mapper.insert: insert into CORPORATION (cor_code, mem_email, cor_reg, cor_name, cor_mname, cor_tel, cor_rdate, cor_postcode, cor_addr, cor_detailaddr, cor_addr_x, cor_addr_y, cor_profile, cor_type, cor_fname, cor_ofname) values (cor_code_seq.nextval, #{mem_email}, #{cor_reg}, #{cor_name}, #{cor_mname}, #{cor_tel}, sysdate, #{cor_postcode}, #{cor_addr}, #{cor_detailaddr}, #{cor_addr_x}, #{cor_addr_y}, #{cor_profile},#{cor_type}, #{cor_fname}, #{cor_ofname})
mapper.update: update CORPORATION set cor_reg = #{cor_reg}, cor_name=#{cor_name}, cor_addr=#{cor_addr}, cor_postcode=#{cor_postcode}, cor_detailaddr=#{cor_detailaddr}, cor_addr_x=#{cor_addr_x}, cor_addr_y=#{cor_addr_y}, cor_profile=#{cor_profile}, cor_type=#{cor_type}, cor_fname=#{cor_fname}, cor_ofname=#{cor_ofname}
